snippet.title: Metaball Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Metaball is a free to play, multi-platform, futuristic arcade sports game based on Basketball where creativity and precision are the most important skills. It is scheduled for release in the second half of 2023.

Play as a Rider, competing in merciless Metaball League games. Get ready to hone your skills and claim riches and honor for yourself and your planet!

Wishlist Metaball now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2215910/Metaball/
